text: @GregAbbott_TX You think we’re stupid.  We’re not.  Manipulating statistics isn’t going to change the fact of our friends and loved ones suffering permanent disabilities even if they don’t die from Covid19.  Thirty thousand cases in Texas.  Where is the Testing and tracing?
